RequiredKeywords.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    RequiredKeywords.@required_keywords — Macro.
    @required_keywords f(...; x::Int=0, y::Int) = ...

    Allows function definitions to have keyword arguments without a default value. These keywords must always be specified. If they are not, a UnassignedKeyword exception is thrown.

    RequiredKeywords.@showexp
    RequiredKeywords.RequiredKeywords — Module.

    Implements the @required_keywords macro which allows function definitions to have keyword arguments without a default value. These keywords must always be specified. If they are not, a UnassignedKeyword exception is thrown.

    RequiredKeywords.UnassignedKeyword — Type.

    Indicated that a funtion has been called without specifying a keyword which has no default.

    RequiredKeywords.eval
